name: MrR
description:
A prototype for an immersive puzzle game about relationships. (No puzzle in this version) 

WASD to move, Space to jump, Shift to dash. 
H to give out heart to people you meet, J to rejuvenate (bring your inverse avatar forward).

Keep both your avatar in-sync in terms of position and reach the end point. 
You lose when you:
- have your two avatars separated too far away.
- run out of hearts.
- move backwards too much.

Midterm for Intermediate Game Programming 
At NYU Game Center.
Spring 2019
